Reset RStudio settings

Source: R/settings--preferences.R
RStudio-settings.Rd

Reset RStudio settings. Correctly works only with RStudio 1.3 or newer.

rstudio_reset_user_settings(to, backup = TRUE, ask = TRUE)

Arguments

to

The name of set with RStudio settings. One of: "rstudio-default", "bio-default", or "bio-dark-blue".
backup

(logical) If TRUE, a backup copy of files with settings is created.
ask

(logical) If TRUE, user confirmation to reset settings is required.

Details

Settings that can be used in rstudio-prefs.json file (for RStudio 1.3 or newer): https://docs.rstudio.com/ide/server-pro/session-user-settings.html

See also

get_path_rstudio_config_file()

RStudio functions .rs.readUiPref(), .rs.writeUiPref().

  • https://stackoverflow.com/a/55940249/4783029

  • https://stackoverflow.com/a/54982341/4783029
